NeoTech API Readme¶

NeoTech API¶

This project contains the RESTful API for the company NeoTech.

Environment Setup:¶

Python¶

It is highly recommended to run everything in an up-to-date virtualenv. The project requires python3 to run properly. The environment can be set up using:

$ RND=$RANDOM
$ virtualenv /tmp/venv$RND --python=python3
$ source /tmp/venv$RND/bin/activate

In order to run the project, requirements need to be installed. This can be done by typing:

$ pip install -r requirements.txt

Running¶

Configurations related to running the project can be found from defaults.cfg.

The API can be run simply with:

$ python api.py

Documentation¶

Build the HTML documentation using:

$ tox -e sphinx
